skull.description: Skull crushers: lying down, lower the weight toward your forehead by bending elbows, then extend elbows to press back up.
tips: Keep elbows pointed up and fairly still
Stop if elbows feel sharp pain

banded-glutes.description: Glute activation using a resistance band (e.g., lateral walks, kickbacks, abductions). Keep constant band tension.

hip-thrust.description: Upper back supported, drive hips up and squeeze glutes at the top, then lower under control.
tips: Pause and squeeze at the top

rdl.description: Romanian deadlift: hinge at the hips with neutral spine, lower until hamstrings stretch, then stand tall.
tips: Keep the weight close to legs

squat-of-choice.description: Choose any squat variation (goblet, back squat, front squat, etc.). Use a controlled range of motion.

bss.description: Bulgarian split squat. This plan uses 14 total reps (typically 7 each side).

ham-curls.description: Hamstring curls (machine, band, Swiss-ball, or sliders). Curl heels toward glutes with control.

lunges.description: Lunges forward/backward or walking. Lower under control and drive back to standing.

calf-raises.description: Rise onto the balls of your feet, pause at the top, then lower slowly to a stretch.

bridge-skull-crush.description: Glute bridge while doing 1-dumbbell skull crushers. Keep hips up and elbows stable.
